Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: What can I do for you?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: How do I do that?/It is not part of my job

Item.speaker: Stephen
Item.line: Put these pieces together and give/them to the gentleman out there

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Pick up the screws and/combine them with this

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Have you seen a man building/a chair?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: The idiot just left without/putting together my chair

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: What the hell are you doing?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Why do you try to give me your work all/the time? I'm not your slave!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Don't start with that shit/again, you know I don't like it!

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: You know very well I/don't like you using me!

Item.speaker: chefgöran
Item.line: This is the third time I've /heard you and Stephen arguing!

Item.speaker: chefgöran
Item.line: which is more that I/can say for you!

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: I haven't got time/to do my own work

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: if I have to help/others all the time!

Item.speaker: chefgöran
Item.line: Your job is to help others!

Item.speaker: chefgöran
Item.line: If that's not good/enough for you

Item.speaker: chefgöran
Item.line: then I don't see you/working here anymore!

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: On his final walk home from work,/Jerry's thoughts were bearing down on him

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Why do I keep spending time with Stephen?/All he does is give me trouble

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: I know I've know him since high school

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: but I really don't feel like/dragging him with me anymore

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Jerry didn't want to/go into Stephen's bedroom.

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Last time he saw some.../disturbing things

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Hey! You must be Jerry!/I've heard so much about you!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: In the shower, he had to scrub/off a bit, if you catch my drift

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: It's Jerry/we really have to talk!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Meet me in the kitchen/when I'm done, ok?

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: When Jerry went in to his/bedroom he noticed the boys

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: hadn't only been using their own bedroom

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Stephen! What the hell is wrong with you?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: I've just been fired/and it's all your fault!

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: But it's your fucking fault! All the time/you make me do your work for you!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Don't blame your inability on me!/You're just a whiny bitch!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: You can't even/manage a job on Jkea!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Good morning, Jerry! How are you?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Let me just make my breakfast in peace, okay?

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: In the following weeks Jerry/struggled to get a job

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Eventually, when he couldn't, he/got invited to a

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: support group for people who/are out of work

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Jerry didn't know yet, but this group/would completely change his life

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: In the meantime he had/started to forgive Stephen.

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Probably because of Stephens never/ending attempts of mending their friendship

Item.speaker: Supportgroup host
Item.line: Today we have a new member of our gang./His name is Jerry!

Item.speaker: Supportgroup host
Item.line: We sincerely hope you/will enjoy your time here

Item.speaker: Supportgroup host
Item.line: and that you will find/this to be an uplifting experience

Item.speaker: Spelare
Item.line: Thank you! I'm sure I will!

Item.speaker: Supportgroup Host
Item.line: So, let's talk about what we/have doing since last time

Item.speaker: Miranda
Item.line: These past days I have been/honing my skills as a

Item.speaker: Miranda
Item.line: I actually met a nice lady/who was willing to give me a job

Item.speaker: Miranda
Item.line: if I just practised more./And that's what I've been doing!

Item.speaker: Random groupmember
Item.line: Can you cut my hair too?

Item.speaker: Supportgroup Host
Item.line: Yes, really nice work!/It's lovely seeing you making progress

Item.speaker: Supportgroup Host
Item.line: Let's move on to you, John....

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: After the meeting the whole/group sat down and got coffee

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Jerry couldn't help but/notice how nice Miranda looked

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: He just had to get a/seat next to her!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Oh, hi Jerry! We would love to chat with you!/Get a spot at our table!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: I managed to/pour all of my coffee on the floor

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: All I wanted was to/have a nice cup of coffee

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: And now I'm out of coins

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: You are so nice! Thank you!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: What can I give you in return?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: You have a very nice tie. Can I have it?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Of course!/I would do anything for the man who gave me coffee!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Thank you so much!/Time to get myself a job!

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: You are very welcome, now/can I please have your chair?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Hi Miranda! That is your name, right?

Item.speaker: Miranda
Item.line: You seem like a lovely/person. At which hospital where you born?

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Jerry and Miranda talked for quite a/while until Miranda excused herself

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: claiming she had to go home

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: As Jerry got to his/apartment it was very quiet

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: So he went into his bedroom/and got ready for bed

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: But suddenly he heard someone/screaming from the other room

Item.speaker: Kent
Item.line: I knew you didn't really care about me!

Item.speaker: Stephen
Item.line: Well you are right! Who could?/You are just a disgusting piece of shit!

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: I know. He really wasn't that nice./You're better off without him

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Jerry decided to comfort Stephen/to the best of his ability

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Thanks, Jerry./Do you want to drink this with me?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Sure, let's go into the living room

Item.speaker: Stephen
Item.line: Hey Jerry, do you remember when we first met?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Sure I do, It was in high school

Item.speaker: Stephen
Item.line: Yes it was. And do you remember when we/threw wheat at that proffessor's house?

Item.speaker: Stephen
Item.line: And do you remember how/high he was next day in class?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: How could I forget? It is one/of the funniest moments of my life

Item.speaker: Stephen
Item.line: And do you remember when the boss at/Jkea got mad and kicked you out of the company?

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: After that night, despite the rough end,/Stephen and Jerry became better friends again

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Two weeks later, Jerry is still/madly in love with Miranda

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Last meeting, she announced that/she had finally got a job

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Having heard this and missing her very/much he decided he needed a haircut

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Problem was, he dind't know which/of the salons she worked at...

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Hello! I would like to get my hair cut

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Jerry? Well, of course!/I'm so surprised to see you here!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: But... you don't have any hair

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: How would you feel about/having dinner with me tonight?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: I would love that./It's been so long since I went out

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Later that night,/Jerry was getting ready for dinner

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Is this where we are supposed to go?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Sorry, I've never been to this part of town,/are we going to a fancy resturant?

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Well of course we are. My favourite

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: It is, eat up and we'll be off

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: So.. I suppose I should go home now

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Thank you for tonight! It was lovely!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Although, I think there is/something I need to tell you...

Item.speaker: Thief
Item.line: Hands up! Give me your/money or I'll shoot!

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Okay, let me just reach into my pocket

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Hello! I would like/to get my hair cut!

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: I will turn you into the/most handsome man on earth

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: You get this cut for free, okay?

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: This was good, because/Jerry forgot to bring cash

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Another thing Jerry learned/early on was to pick up things

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: He did this by clicking on them

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: He could then review the items he had/collected by pressing the I key

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: By pressing the right mouse button on/the item he inspected the item further

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: This was done by clicking on/one item and then clicking on another

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: The built thing could then be used to/open doors or they could be given to other people

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Clicking on an item, closing/the inventory and then using it on a door unlocked it

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: If only I looked better I could get a job!

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: This game saves automatically/You will be notified when a save occurs

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: The story of Jerry is/a touching one indeed

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: And I'm not one easily/touched by stories

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Now Jerry was a very ordinary man,/he had his work and he had his friends

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Jerry picked up how to/interact with the world early on

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: One day followed another and soon Jerry/got employed by a large furniture company

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: The days started to melt togheter as/the work got more and more monotonous

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: And one day Jerry was at a crossroads

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Even though he didn't know yet,/that day would change his life forever

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Hey! This part of town is/for non-uggos only

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: SO FIX YOUR LOOKS OR LEAVE

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Jerry finds a nice outfit in the closet

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: The machine lights up and says:/insert coins

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: Jerry found himself inside/the local hospital

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: I wanted to thank you for/taking that bullet for me

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: It's the nicest thing anyone's done for me

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: There's something else I/want to talk to you about

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: I'm afraid there might/have been a misunderstanding

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: I hope you didn't think we were/going out as anything but friends

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Okay. Get some sleep. You deserve it

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Heartbreaks like these can/lead to the best parts of your life

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: My wife left me a couple of years/ ago so I joined the army

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: It's a great way to let your anger out

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: You want to join the army?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Think you got what it takes?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Since broken-hearted men are the/toughest fighters I say

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Since broken-hearted men are the/toughest fighters I say

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Now, you're going to need a code name

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: In the army we don't go around talking to/people by their wimpy real names

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Tell me. What are you good at?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Well, what did you work with before?

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: 14 months later/13000ft above the qatarian desert

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: You know about our relations/with Denmark, right?

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: The situation is tense, to say the least

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: Ten months ago/the danes elected king Johnson

Item.speaker: Jerry
Item.line: Strange that people would elect a king

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: King Johnson is not fond of our country/and he's spoken publicly

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: about the death of everyone/of our nationality

Item.speaker: Jerry
Item.line: Harsh. Does he have a reason for this?

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: There are rumors going around saying/that they are planning

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: to attack us with a nuclear bomb

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: The only ally to the Danish that/would have access to nuclear weapons

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: Which leads me to your mission:

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: Infiltrate the Danish embassy and/find out what they're up to

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: I will assist you using this radio

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: You will not need any weapons/for this mission

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: as any fatalities would/make situations worse

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: Any equipment you need, you will have/to find or construct yourself

Item.speaker: Jerry
Item.line: You've got to be kidding me

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: This game saves automatically/You will be notified when a save occurs

Item.speaker: Radio
Item.line: You're gonna have to walk for a litte/while to get to your target

Item.speaker: Player
Item.line: Why didn't you tell me to wait?

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Here's a little something/for helping me

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: Only qatari or danish/residents may enter

Item.speaker: Narrator
Item.line: This is where the beta ends

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: I've already given you my tie

Item.speaker: NPC
Item.line: What else can I give you?
